column5: A spacious bedroom in a quiet neighborhood in North Denton. It comfortably fits two with a cozy queen size bed and workspace in room. Enjoy a large kitchen, common areas, washer/dryer, grand piano, backyard, and balcony access. Just 3 minutes from shopping/restaurants, 10 minutes from UNT and the downtown square.  Keypad lock on front door, so no worrying about keys. Guest bathroom is right outside bedroom, but is shared only if we have another guest (family/friend) but priority is yours.
